names.english: nourish the liver and tonify the kidneys formula
names.commonEnglish: Nourish the Liver and Tonify the Kidneys Formula

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.
With Xuan Shen, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with Fire Blazing with soreness and swelling in the throat, dry mouth and a parched tongue.
With Mu Dan Pi, for Kidney Yin Deficiency with steaming bones.
With Mu Dan Pi and Chi Shao, for purpura or bleeding with maculae and blotches on the skin.
Nourishes the Blood and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
Clears Heat, drains Fire, nourishes Yin, moistens Dryness, generates Fluids, clears Deficiency Fire and quenches thirst.
With Xuan Shen and Sheng Di Huang, for ulcers of the oral cavity.
Stabilizes the Kidneys, astringes Jing and Body Fluids, tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and strengthens Kidney Yang.
With Shu Di Huang, nourishes Kidney Yin and secures Jing, while restraining urination and sweating.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and drains Fire.
With Mu Dan Pi, for erysipelas and purplish rashes.
Clears Heat, cools, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, clears Deficiency Fire and clears Liver Fire.
With Chi Shao, cools the Blood and disperses Stasis, for Ying Stage Heat with epistaxis, hemoptysis, hemafecia, hematuria, menorrhagia and skin rashes.
With Zhi Mu and Sheng Di Huang, for menopause with Yin Deficiency and Heat.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, relieves pain, clears Heat, cools the Blood and clears Liver Fire.
Nourishes the Blood, regulates menstruation, astringes Yin and calms Liver Yang.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
Invigorates the Blood, expels Blood Stasis, nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin and descends Blood and Fire.
With Sheng Di Huang, powerfully clears Deficiency Fire Blazing Upward with pain and swelling of the gums, epistaxis, hematemesis and other hemorrhage in the upper body.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin, cools the Blood and stops bleeding.
With Sheng Di Huang, for hematemesis and hematuria due to Hot Blood.
Clears Heat, strongly relieves Fire toxins and promotes urination.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and cools the Blood.
With Mu Dan Pi and Sheng Di Huang, for Ying Stage Heat with high fever, irritability, hemoptysis, epistaxis, and subcutaneous bleeding.
Nourishes the Liver
Tonifies the Kidneys
Nourishes Yin
Descends Deficiency Fire
Clears Heat
Cools the Blood
syndromes: Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency with Fire Rising

symptoms: The lesions are few and scattered
Aching, soreness or weakness of the low back
Aching in the leg and heel
A low grade fever in the afternoon
Dry throat, maybe recurrent sore throat

modifications.purpose: lesions on the face and mouth ulcers
